==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
From {{och-l|清|clear; pure}} and {{och-l|明|bright}}. Attested in ''{{w|Shijing}}'' ("(of governance) to be methodical, orderly"), ''{{w|Xunzi}}'' ("(of water) clear and bright"), ''{{w|Classic of Rites}}'' ("sober, calm"; "(of voice) clear"), ''{{w|:zh:逸周書|Lost Book of Zhou}}'' ("(the date of) Qingming, from brightness, clearness of the scenery"), ''{{w|Guoyu (book)|Guoyu}}'' ("southeasterly winds").
